services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

aboutpara:
üëãüèΩ My name is Varshni Karthikeyan and I am a senior at the University of Texas at Dallas studying Software Engineering + pursuing a certificate in Applied Experience Design and Research. 

Additionally, I am the secretary for the User Experience Club at UTD. Growing up, I had a passion for art and wanted to find a way to merge my creative side with a technical field. That's when I discovered user experience design, which offers a combination of both plus so much more!

resume.tagline: Motivated UX designer with a passion for delivering excellent user experiences.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Collaborated with developers and stakeholders to design 8 intuitive mobile UI screens ensuring seamless user interactions and alignment with the app‚Äôs goals, Designed 4 visually compelling App Store previews optimizing the app‚Äôs presentation for better user engagement and download rates

Collaborated with design team to design and refine user interfaces and components using Figma focusing on usability and consistent branding resulting in 600+ new site visits, Analyzed user behavior to identify usability issues to increase product discoverability and improve site navigation using Microsoft Clarity to increase page load speed by 30%, Cooperated with development team to implement 10+ responsive front-end interfaces using Angular

education.universityPara: Pursing a Bachelors in Software Engineering + Certificate in Applied Experience Design and Research
